createVideo.description: Generate a video using a studio avatar

props.name: avatarId
props.description: The ID of the avatar to be used for the video generation

props.name: script
props.description: The script to be used for the video generation

props.name: voiceId
props.description: The ID of the voice to be used for the video generation

props.name: webhookUrl
props.description: The URL to which the webhook will be sent when video generation is complete

props.name: use_speaker_boost
props.description: Enable speaker boost for better voice quality

props.name: waitForCompletion
props.description: Wait for the video generation to complete and return the video URL. If disabled, only returns the video ID.
